Font:+- LONDON- The British prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson resigned on Friday, as prosecutors stepped up their inquiries into illegal phone hacking at a tabloid newspaper when he was editor. We confirm that Andy Coulson has resigned, an official in Prime Minister David Cameron 's office said.
